titles.title: To ban anticompetitive terms in facility and insurance contracts that limit access to higher quality, lower cost care.
To ban anticompetitive terms in facility and insurance contracts that limit access to higher quality, lower cost care.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
